segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and it's disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor looks so messy and unsanitary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is just standing there, drying a plate, not caring about the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, trying to get cookies without their mom knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is being very careless, standing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not helping at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman doesn't notice the water spilling all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is going to be a mess if someone doesn't do something soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the cookie jar is full, but it's not worth the risk the boy is taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should be more aware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone cleans up the mess before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
